javafx.plus.util

Class Classie

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.plus.util.Classie

  • public class Classie
extends java.lang.Object
    Classie is utility made for add,remove,checking styleclass to a node. It is inspired by popular javascript Classie.js.
    Author:
    theBeacon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void add(javafx.scene.Node node, java.lang.String... styleClasses)
      Adds StyleClass(es) to a node
      static boolean has(javafx.scene.Node node, java.lang.String... styleClasses)
      Checks the presence of StyleClass(es) in node
      static void remove(javafx.scene.Node node, java.lang.String... styleClasses)
      Removes StyleClass(es) from a node
      static void removeByPattern(javafx.scene.Node node, java.lang.String regex)
      Removes all the classes which match with regex from a node
      static void toggle(javafx.scene.Node node, java.lang.String styleClass)
      Toggles(if there remove it,else add it) the style class from/to a node
